name: Sparkchild
description:
As a child of flame, you must protect the last fire. Fight against waves of enemies and upgrade your spark.

Tutorial:

WASD - Move

Click/Hold click - Shoot

Mouse - Aim

In order to shoot, the spark (player) must stay within a warm zone, such as around the center campfire. But in order to gather XP dropped by enemies, you must leave your comfort zone and pick up the orbs. Every level up, you'll be given a choice between 3 random upgrades to empower your spark into a force to be reckoned with.

Features:

  • 8 upgrades to discover
  • 4 completely unique enemies
  • Scaling difficulty
